name: Read to Get to Bed
description:
This game represents someone's thoughts coming home form work to get to bed. This game scrolls at the speed of their thoughts. Reading this game gets them to bed. They will always make it to bed. 

Clicking pursues thoughts. Some will help get them to bed sooner, some will distract them and keep them from it.

Don't worry too much, even when you get to bed. You'll always come home again.

Created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2019 by Jason Li

With tremendous thanks to Amanda, Bryan, Bri, Charles, Chris,  Emma, Jenny, Katherine, Kess, Malcolm, Sarah, and many others for their support.
